parameters.Message: Success. Notebook execution is completed successfully.
Failed. Notebook execution has encountered an error.

activities.name: Mail if book file is missing

body.value:
@concat('{
    "EmailTo":"',activity('parameter').output.firstRow.mail,'",
    "Subject":"An error has occured in the {',pipeline().Pipeline, '} -pipeline for file- {',activity('parameter').output.firstRow.book,'}",
    "DataFactoryName":"',pipeline().DataFactory,'",
    "PipelineName":"',pipeline().Pipeline,'",
    "Activity":"Unable to copy files from inbound to input directory",
    "ErrorMessage":"File Missing from inbound directory",
    "FileName":"',activity('parameter').output.firstRow.book ,'"}')
